content.query:
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_LoadDim_Office]    Script Date: 12/22/2022 5:12:30 AM ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE OR ALTER   PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_LoadDim_Office]
( @GetNewWaterMark bit=0,@RowValidFrom Datetime2(7)='1900-01-01 00:00:00.0000000'
)
AS
Begin 
	IF @GetNewWaterMark>0
	BEGIN
	SELECT isnull(max(RowValidFrom),@RowValidFrom) AS RowValidFrom
			FROM [dbo].[ws_office]
			WHERE CAST(RowValidFrom As datetime2(7))>@RowValidFrom
	END
	ELSE
WITH CTE AS (
SELECT 
	 [ws_officeid] AS			[OfficeID]
	,[ws_name] AS				[OfficeName]
	,b.LocalizedLabel AS		[Status]
	,C.LocalizedLabel AS		[StatusReason]
	,[ws_areaname] AS			[AreaName]
    ,[ws_associatedqueuename]   [AssociatedQueueName]
	,[versionnumber]
	,[ws_area] AS				[AreaID]
	,[ws_associatedqueue] AS	[OfficeQueueID]
	,convert(datetimeoffset,[modifiedon]) as		[ModifiedDate]
	,convert(datetimeoffset,[createdon]) as			[CreatedDate]
	,createdbyname as	[CreatedBy]
	,modifiedbyname		[ModifiedBy]
	,ROW_NUMBER()OVER (PARTITION BY ID Order by versionnumber DESC) AS ROW_RUM
	,a.RowValidFrom,a.RowValidTo,a.RowIsCurrent  
FROM [dbo].[ws_office] A
	LEFT JOIN [dbo].[StateMetadata] B
		  ON A.statecode=b.State
		  AND b.EntityName='ws_office'
		  AND a.RowIsCurrent='true'
LEFT JOIN [dbo].StatusMetadata C
		  ON A.statuscode=C.Status
		  AND c.EntityName='ws_office'
		  AND a.RowIsCurrent='true'
		   WHERE CAST(a.RowValidFrom as datetime2(7)) > @RowValidFrom)

SELECT 
  --Row_NUMBER() Over (order by [OfficeID] desc)+1000 AS OfficeKey

[OfficeName]
,[AreaName]
,[AssociatedQueueName]
,[OfficeID]
,[AreaID]
,[OfficeQueueID]
FROM CTE WHERE ROW_RUM=1 and status='Active' and OfficeID is not null
UNION 
SELECT 
Null,
Null,
Null,
'UNKNOWN',
'UNKNOWN',
'UNKNOWN'
END
GO
